Vocaloid_Style_Phrase: I always agree with the silence between us.
That beautiful lie still haunts my dreams.
Let’s create a future no one else imagined.
I decide to disappear before the dawn.
I feel your shadow even now.
I can't give you back what I stole.
Love isn't easy, but I still tried.
The most important word I forgot was 'goodbye'.
Won’t you join me in this fading song?
My hope dances on broken melodies.
